page-index-activity-description: Ethereum ndiyo puratifomu inotungamira yekupa, kutonga, uye kugadzirisa midziyo yedhijitari. Kubva pamari yakaitwa tokeni uye zviridzwa zvemari kuenda kumidziyo chaiyo yenyika nemisika iri kusimukira, Ethereum inopa hwaro hwakachengeteka, husina kwarunomira hwehupfumi hwedhijitari.
page-index-bento-assets-content: Kubva kuhunyanzvi kuenda kuzvivakwa nemasheya, chero chinhu chinokosha chinogona kuitwa tokeni paEthereum kuratidza nekuonesa muridzi padhijitari. Tenga, tengesa, chinjana, uye gadzira zvinhu zvinokosha nezvinounganidzwaâ€”chero nguva, chero kupi.
page-index-bento-dapps-content: MaApp akavakirwa paEthereum anoshanda pasina kutengesa data rako. Kubva pasocial media kuenda kumitambo kusvika kubasa, shandisa account imwe chete kune yese app itsva uchichengetedza zvakavanzika zvako nekuwana.
page-index-bento-defi-content: Kwereta, kweretesa, wana mubereko, nezvimwe, pasina account yekubhangi. Sisitimu yezvemari yakaganhurwa yeEthereum yakavhurika 24/7 kune chero munhu ane internet.
page-index-bento-networks-content: Mazana emaLayer 2 networks akavakirwa paEthereum. Nakidzwa nemari shoma yekubhadhara uye kutengeserana kunenge kuri ipapo-nepapo uchibatsirwa nekuchengetedzwa kweEthereum kwakaratidzwa.
page-index-bento-stablecoins-content: Stablecoins imari dzinochengetedza mutengo wakadzikama, wakafananidzwa nemidziyo yakatsiga sedhora rekuAmerica. Wana mabhadharo epasi rese ipapo ipapo kana kuchengetedza kukosha mumadhora edhijitari paEthereum.
page-index-builders-description: Ethereum ndiyo nzvimbo yevagadziri vakuru uye vakakurumbira vemaapu vepaWEb3. Shandisa JavaScript uye Python, kana kuti dzidza mutauro unoshandiswa pamakondirakiti wakadai seSolidity kana kuti Vyper pakunyora zvine chokuita neapu yako.
page-index-community-description-1: Webhusaiti ye-ethereum.org yakagadzirwa uye kutarisirwa nemazana evashanduri, nyanzvi dzekuisa makodhi, vanodhizaina, vanoita zvekukopa mashoko uye nhengo dzevazvipiri vane chido mwedzi mumwe nemumwe.
page-index-community-description-2: Huya ubvunze mibvunzo, usangane nevanhu vakasiyana-siyana kupota pasi rose uye ubatsiridze pakuumba webhusaiti iyi. Uchawana ruzivo rwakakodzera uye kutungamirirwa pakuita basa iri!
page-index-community-description-3: Pa-ethereum.org ndipo panzvimbo pekutangira uye pekudzidzira pakanaka.
page-index-cta-wallet-description: Gadzira maakaundi uye utarisire zvakanaka midziyo inokosha
page-index-description: Puratifomu yemberi inowanikwa maapu ekuitisa hudobidobi uye ine manetiweki emakambani makuru
page-index-developers-code-example-descr: Gadzira bhanga rinosundwa nepfungwa dzawakaruka wega
Gadzira matokeni aunogona kutumira kumwe uye kushandisa pamaapu akawanda
Shandisa mitauro iripo kuti ugone kudyidzana neEthereum uye mamwe maapu
Fungdzirazve masevhisi aripo seeruzhinji, maapu anogona kushandiswa nevese-vese
page-index-events-subtitle: Vanoshandisa Ethereum vanova nezviitiko pasi rose, gore rese
page-index-hero-image-alt: Mufananidzo weguta ramangwana uchimirira nharaunda yeEthereum.
page-index-join-action-contribute-descri: Tsvaga nzira dzakasiyana-siyan dzaunogona kubatsira nadzo ethereum.org kuti ivandudzike uye ive nani.
page-index-join-action-discord-descripti: Kubvunza mibvunzo, kuronga mipiro uye kujowina muzvikumbiro zvevanoishandisa.
page-index-join-action-github-descriptio: Batsira pakuisa makodhi, pakudhizaina, pakunyora nyaya, nezvakada kudaro.
page-index-join-action-twitter-descripti: Kuti ugare uine mashoko achangobva kubuda uye nhau dzinokosha.
page-index-join-description: Webhusaiti ye ethereum.org inovakwa nekuchengetedzwa nezviuru zvevaturikiri, macoders, magadziri, vanyori vekopi, uye nhengo dzenharaunda. Munogona kupa mazano ekugadzirisa chero zvirimo pane ino saiti yakavhurika.
page-index-learn-description: Ethereum inetwork yeblockchain yakaganhurwa uye puratifomu yekuvandudza software, inofambiswa necryptocurrency ether (ETH). Zvishandiso izvi ndiro gedhi renyu rekufamba, kunzwisisa, uye kushandisa Ethereum nechivimbo.
page-index-what-is-ethereum-description-: Ethereum inetwork yeblockchain yakaganhurwa, yakavhurika, uye puratifomu yekuvandudza software, inofambiswa necryptocurrency ether (ETH). Ethereum ndiyo hwaro hwakachengeteka, hwepasi rose hwechizvarwa chitsva chemaapplication asingamisiki.
Network yeEthereum yakavhurikira munhu wese: hapana mvumo inodiwa. Haina muridzi, uye inovakwa nekuchengetedzwa nezviuru zvevanhu, masangano, nevashandisi pasi rese.
page-index-what-is-ether-description-1: Ether (ETH) ndiyo cryptocurrency yemuno inofambisa network yeEthereum, inoshandiswa kubhadhara mari yekutengeserana nekuchengetedza blockchain kuburikidza nekustake.
page-index-what-is-ether-description-2: Kunze kwebasa rayo rehunyanzvi, ETH imari yedhijitari yakavhurika, inogoneka. Inoshandiswa pakubhadhara kwepasi rose, sechibatiso chezvikwereti, uye senzvimbo yekuchengetera kukosha isingavimbi nechero sangano repakati.
page-index-meta-description: Ethereum ipuratifomu yemari yepasi rose uye mhando itsva dzemaapu. Ethereum inoshandiswa kuita mabasa akasiyana sokuchengetedza nekutambidzana mari uye kugadzira mamwe maapu anowanikwa pasi rose.
page-index-network-stats-tx-cost-descrip: Mutengo uri paavhareji wekufambiswa kwemari pakubhadharana
page-index-posts-subtitle: Zvichangobva kutumirwa pa-blog uye mashoko achangobva kupiwa nevanoishandisa
page-index-values-description: Iva pachikamu chekuitwa kwezvinhu pachishandiswa makombiyuta
page-index-values-ownership-legacy-conte: Uchishandisa bhanga kana panzvimbo yedandemutande reruzhinji, midziyo yako inokosha nemashoko zvinotarisirwa nesangano. Unotsamira pavari kuti uzviwane uye pakuzvidzora.
Vanogona kushandisa mashoko ako munzira yausingabvumirani nayo, zvichienderana nemitemo yavo.
page-index-values-ownership-ethereum-con: NeEthereum, iwe ndiwe wega une mukana wekuona uye kudzora zvinhu. Hakuna mumwe anokwanisa kushandisa midziyo yako inokosha. Unogona kusarudza waunoda kupa mvumo yekuita izvi.
page-index-values-fairness-legacy-conten: Nhasi, haasi munhu wese anokwanisa kubatsirwa nevanobata nhau dzemari. Vamwe vanhu vanosangana nezvipingamupinyi pakuti wavane rubatsiro urwu nekuda kwekwavanogara kana kuti nyika yavo.
page-index-values-fairness-ethereum-cont: Tinodavira kuti munhu wese anofanira kubvumirwa kuti abatsirikane pahurongwa hunoitwa pasi rose. Ichi ndicho chikonzero nei Ethereum ichipa munhu wese mukana wakaenzanirana pasi rose, pasinei nekuti ndiwe ani kana kuti unobva kupi.
page-index-values-privacy-legacy-content: Hatitarisiri hurumende, makambani mahombe, kana kuti mamwe masangano makuru asingazivikanwi kuti ahwanze zvatiri achishandisa mari yavo.
Maapu mazhinji anounganidza mashoko akawanda nezvako sezvingabvira kuti azoti nanga-nanga newe pakushambadzira zvinhu.
page-index-values-privacy-ethereum-conte: Vanoshandisa Ethereum vanokoshesa nhau yekuhwanzika kwemashoko ane chokuita nemunhu. Une kodzero yekushandisa maapu usingazviratidzi kuti ndiwe ani kana kupa mashoko ekuti unobatika sei.
page-index-values-integration-legacy-con: Maapu mazhinji anokumanikidza kuti ugadzire maakaundi akazvimirira, zvichiita kuti zvikuomere kuyeuka mashoko aunoshandisa pakupinda mumaakaundi aya nemashoko awakanyoresa pakuagadzira.
page-index-values-integration-ethereum-c: NeEthereum unokwanisa kushandisazve akaundi imwe chete pamaapu ese. Hapana kunyoresa kwakazvimirira kunodiwa.
page-index-values-decentralization-legac: Varidzi vemakambani ndevanazvina mabhizimisi vakazvimirira nevane masheya. Vanhu ava ndivo vane simba pamafambisirwo ebhizimisi uye ndivo vanowana zvakawanda kubva pakubudirira kwaro.
page-index-values-decentralization-ether: Kungofanana neindaneti, Ethereum haisi yemunhu. Inogoveranwa uye kuumbwa zvakafanana nevese. Hapana muridzi mumwe chete wayo anoidzora.
page-index-values-censorship-legacy-cont: Mapuratifomu echimanje-manje kazhinji anochinja pamwe chete nemitemo yawo. Izvi zvinogona kukonzerwa nevanoronga mafambisirwo ayo, vanomaneja makambani kana kuti hurumende dzinodzvanyirira.
page-index-values-censorship-ethereum-co: Kusakwanisika kudzvanyiririka kweEthereum ndiyo nheyo huru yayo. Mashandiro ayo anofanira kugara akanakira vose uye asina kwaakarerekera.
Ethereum haikwanisiki kudzorwa nechero nyika, kambani kana kuti mumwewo munhu.
page-index-values-open-legacy-content-0: Makambani anochengetedza pfuma yavo yehungwaru uye haagovane. Hapana munhu ari kunze kwekambani anogona kuona kuti zvinhu zvinoshanda sei, kugadzirisa matambudziko, kana kuita zvirinani. Zvinonetsa kuti vanhu vagadzire zvishandiso zvitsva kana kugadzirisa.
page-index-values-open-ethereum-content-: Ethereum ndeyemunhu wese. Munhu wese anokwanisa kuona, kushandisa uye kuvandudza kodhi, achiita kuti ishandire munhu wese zviri nani.
page-index-fusaka-description: Kuitira network yeEthereum inokurumidza, yakachengeteka, uye iri nyore kushandisa |
